description: This file contains CSS styles for managing themes in a web application, particularly for light and dark themes. It includes style rules for the main application components and defines CSS variables for color management.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with center-aligned text and background color based on theme.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo, includes height and pointer events.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header component with a dark background, flexbox layout for centering content.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links with color transition based on theme.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including animations and responsive designs.
